description: The RCMP has a requirement for janitorial and snow clearing services for the M Division Headquarters which includes various buildings. The qualified contractor will provide all labour, materials, tools, equipment, transportation and supplies including daily site supervision necessary to provide janitorial and snow clearing services. The contract period will be for two years from the date of contract with an irrevocable option to extend it for up to three additional one-year periods.
duration_in_months: While the contract period is 2 years, there is an option to extend for up to 3 additional 1-year periods.
